snippet: Renovations to the Irish Repertory Theater’s home on West 22nd Street mean it will present this season at the DR2 Theater on East 15th Street.
abstract: Renovations to the Irish Repertory Theater’s home on West 22nd Street mean it will present this season at the DR2 Theater on East 15th Street.

headline.main: Renovation Plan Sends Irish Rep's Season to a Temporary Home
headline.print_headline: Renovation Starts At Irish Rep Theater
